Subject: Extending ExtractorHTML to skip <img > elements
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=422010605


--0003255597fe73e54f04809bf647
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hi all,

I want to save some bandwidth by getting the extractor to not fetch embedded
images (rather than my current MO of fetching them then filtering them out
by looking at Content-Type). I've looked at the source code of ExtractorHTML
class and it didn't seem clear to me how the <img> elements are being
captured.

So my two small questions: is ExtractorHTML the class to be modified if one
wants embedded images not to be fetched at all? 2) If yes, can you give me a
rough idea which part of the regex in that class I need to modify?

Thanks,

Anas

--0003255597fe73e54f04809bf647
